title: Rinser, Wineglass, ca. 1783–99
markings: Marks: Impressed below, "Penrose Waterford" (only ROS visible)
provenance: Cecil Davis, LTD. 3 Grosvenor St. New bond St. London, WI, (6-10-65) purchase by P. Warren.
description: Straight-sided, circular vessel with 2 pouring lips molded comb flutes, 4.5 cm. high, around base. Bottom has molded radial flutes and pontil work. Impressed with "Penrose Waterford" stamp.

tombstone.epitaph:
Rinser, Wineglass, ca. 1783–99.
ca. 1783–99. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-166.
